response.overview: Split  Ends is an animated addendum to her recently published book of the same  title. This film flows from a text that inspired the ideas and  questions explored in the book, delving into Oliver's relationship with  her hair as a lens to understand her identity, lineage, and cultural  heritage. In  the film, the artist uses vegetable roots as symbols for split  endsâ€”those old, often hidden or trimmed parts of hair. Instead of  concealing them, the film celebrates their age, complexity, and  perseverance. The film is accompanied by a live narration from the  artist's diary.
response.title: Split Ends
